title: Dialogflow - Create a prebuilt agent
abstract:
# Dialogflow - Create a prebuilt agent
The first step in this tutorial is to create an agent. Rather than building an agent from scratch, you will import a banking [prebuilt agent](/dialogflow/es/docs/agents-prebuilt) . Using a prebuilt agent will accelerate your progress for this tutorial.
To import the prebuilt agent:
- Go to the [Dialogflow ES Console](https://dialogflow.cloud.google.com) .
- Click **Prebuilt agents** in the left sidebar menu.
- Hover your mouse over the **Banking** prebuilt agent.
- Click **Import** .
- A dialog box appears.
- Provide a name for your agent.
- Either create a new GCP project or choose an existing one.
- Click **Create Agent From Template** .
In the next step, you will create a webhook service for this agent
